text: chiwit khwam pen xyu hæng lok ni nan di thuk pradab hı swyngam kæ phu ptiseth sraththa thanghlay læa phwk khea yang yey hyan brrda phu thi srath aa dwy tæ brrda phu yakerng nan henux kwa phwk khea nı wan ki ya mah læa xallxh ca thrng prathan paccay yangchiph kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh doy prascak kar khanwn nab
